T210 Series 8 Old Mill Southern Leaguer's For Sale :

These don't come around very often, especially in a large grouping.  I also have a few other Series 8's I can sell as well.

If interested in purchasing any of these very scarce Southern Leaguer's please email me at jeremyj70@comcast.net  

Email order takes precedence in buying any of these - Thanks, JJ

Price Range Update - $195-$295 each - depending on card and condition.

Bronkie just sold -

Thanks,  JJ
